channel.title: How to make people drop tokens in wildy?
channel.description:
hey mopar. i am making a 704 pking server. i have made a pk reward shop where you can spend "Fist of guthix" tokens.
i am stuck tho. i dont know how i can make it so that when someone is killed in the wildy the person who killed them gets 10 tokens in there inventory?
